Mr. Harry Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of Education Broadcaster
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry,
Would you head the discussion at the Radio and
Recording session on the topic ’’Discussion of the
Availability of N.A.E.B. tape programs to the
State and University tape service”?
If there is anyone else you would like to have
assist you, let us know.
Sincerely,
ERNEST TIEMANN
Director, Visual Instruction Bureau,
University of Texas
PAUL W. F. WITT
Professor of Education, Teachers
College, Columbia University

FLOYDE E. BROOKER

by

P.S. We will keep in mind your letter of
November 18. Still hope you can make
it.
MARY C. WELCH
